source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive storm cloud forming and moving over a vast, flat prairie. The scene captures the dramatic contrast between the deep blue sky, the bright white of the cloud, and the golden-brown landscape below. The video showcases the powerful and dynamic nature of weather systems in an open environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive storm cloud forming and moving over a vast, flat prairie. The scene captures the dramatic contrast between the deep blue sky, the bright white of the cloud, and the golden-brown landscape below. The video showcases the powerful and dynamic nature of weather systems in an open environment.

generated_critique: The caption includes subjective adjectives ("massive," "dramatic," "powerful," "dynamic") and abstract interpretations ("showcases the powerful and dynamic nature of weather systems"), which violate the instructions. The second and third sentences focus on visual aesthetics and interpretation rather than the subject's motion. The description of motion should be more specific, noting that the cloud expands and drifts from left to right across the frame.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video shows a large, white storm cloud forming and moving over a flat, grassy landscape under a blue sky. The cloud expands and drifts from left to right across the frame.
